title: Early Morning Chores
text: Working with safety. The sun is low, and the soil is cool and soft. We plan the day: planting, irrigation, and equipment checks. I clean the barn after milking and store the tools. In Canadian winter, we protect equipment from freezing. We sell fresh vegetables at the local market. The greenhouse helps control temperature and humidity. I feed the cows and make sure they have clean water. In the morning, I wake up early and walk to the fields. I check the crops to see if the plants are healthy. I work on Green Valley Farm, and every day is busy.
